name: Cow Girl 2
description:
Our farm is the best! Here you will find the most beautiful cows in the whole neighborhood. They bask in the sun all day long and enjoy fragrant herbs. I am sure you will get yourself the most beautiful cow, and she will give you a lot of milk in gratitude! (´｡• ω •｡`)

Easy win: Keyboard Сtrl+D - Complete Level


In the game, your goal is to collect the puzzle in order to restore the pictures.

FEATURES


  • 🐄 Beautiful artwork
  • 🐄 Animated characters
  • 🐄 Relaxing music
  • 🐄 CG Gallery Mode
  • 🐄 Puzzle game
